pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correcting False Discovery Rates // There are many estimators of false discovery rate. In this package we compute the Nonlocal False Discovery Rate (NFDR) and the estimators of local false discovery rate: Corrected False discovery Rate (CFDR), Re- ranked False Discovery rate (RFDR) and the blended estimator. Bickel, D. R. (2016) http://hdl.handle.net/10393/34277.
